name: Feldoreus, Goldsmith
description:
Feldoreus isn't one of these newfangled alchemists, with their stamina potions and phoenix feathers.

He's proud to stick to what alchemy has always been for time immemorial: turning boring metals into gold.

Move Feldoreus with the arrow keys to help him achieve what generations of philosophers before him were unable to.

                                                                                    

Feldoreus, Goldsmith was made in one day for PB & Jam 2022, part of the New Zealand Games Festival.

Sound effects from Freesound users Sethroph, SuddenDice, ristooooo1 and TasmanianPower.
